content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready to meet with two people to go on a run (i'll reference them as p1 and p2). i was waiting around in a parking lot when i looked into the sky and saw a pure red light. this struck me as odd because at first it seemed to be a plane of some sort except something was off about it. for starters, at first it was only giving off red light. no other color flashing like planes usually have. second, it was moving strangely. it was like it was taking a large turn or even slowly spinning. just in time, p1 showed up. i yelled for them to come look and by the time they got a good look the light was changing white. this suddenly made me think it was some type of average aircraft but something was still off. it almost seemed like it was spinning, revealing different colored lights as it spun. p1, a skeptic of sorts, admitted it was very strange. then, p1 and i walked about 30 - 50 feet to meet p2. we brought to their attention the strange object to which they had nothing notable to say. but now it was turning turquoise, intermixing with the other color just like before. p1 offered to snap a picture and video with their phone. strangely, the object came out white despite the fact it was clearly not white. this could be attributed to the low quality of the camera. unfortuantely, she deleted the pictures under the claim that they were nothing more than a blurry white dot but preserved the video. we started the run and finished with no further incident. after p2 left, p1 and i decided to sit at a bench overlooking a canyon. as we sat a helicopter flew nearby with a very bright light i could only assume was a search light. it is not clear whether or not this is significant but i thought i might as well include it. this occured at around 6:45. we then walked to get food. on the way we witnessed another questionable scene. looking up into the sky we saw 4 or 5 green lights moving in a straight path, seemingly following eachother. the lights, again, were a pure color which is strange for a plane. however, if i can recall correctly, at least 2 had some white light mixed in. there were planes in the visisble area. this occured at around 7:15. there were no more incidents after this.
content.summary: Strange lights in the sky that moved in a line and flashed different colors.

content.detailedDescription: We were watching the sunset from a roof top patio in puerto penasco. the object was not visible with our eyes but showed up in the lense and photos. i didn't know what to think but took several more photos. when i viewed them i  was astonished.
content.summary: Was watching the sunset from a roof top patio, this object was not be seen but showed up in lense and photos.

content.detailedDescription: We were out on our porch and saw this red light blinking. we're not sure what it was but it was circling south of us going from n/w to s/e. it would be stationary at times with a white light and then continue moving with a red blinking light. it lasted about 20 minutes and then it was gone.
content.summary: A red light blinking but would go off at times and then blink white

content.detailedDescription: my family and i were across the street at the golf course and had just finished watching the annual fireworks show. we were talking and walking out onto the street when we noticed the orb coming towards us. we only live across the street from the golf course so our walk home was going to be short. the orb was coming across the sky towards us when we noticed it. i took out my flip and videotaped it as it came almost over us and just past us. the orb was a very bright red/orange color that looked like it was on fire yet it shimmered and rippled as water does. there was no sound from the object as it went over either. as i was taping there was a man and his children standing not 5 ft from me yet they and no one else around us(my husband and i)would look up! so at the end of the taping you hear me on the phone to my sister and her granddaughter who are already across the street in front of the house. my sister was just across the street from where we were so she and bella were watching the orb too. i was sooo excited to have seen it again but just when i thought it was gone there was another sighting just a half an hour later...But there were four more! i was in shock because i never thought we would see the orbs again. in total there was four separate sightings. the first was in march and we were maybe 50 ft from three orbs sitting in the sky forming an isosceles triangle above some houses. the second was this time that i just wrote about on the 4th of july. the third happened that same night on the 4th of july and the fourth sighting was on new years eve which there were three orbs.  i am excited yet angry at the same time. i have had many experiences before but never like this. it is all i can think about and i am very conflicted about it.
content.summary: Very bright glowing orb of red and orange that looked like on fire but yet shimmered like water does

content.detailedDescription: On way in to eat diner at olive garden with co workers and my boss pointed it out. it was moving in a straight line above us very slow and seemed to be very high. we watched it for 6 or 7 minutes and then walked toward the entrance when we looked back we could not find it. i grew up between johns illegal air base and willow grove nas.And know all aircraft type and have never witnessed any thing like it.
content.summary: Like an egg on end bright top dark bottom

content.detailedDescription:
My gal and i were awakened by an intermittent but rythmic, very audible buzz which pulsed from very slow sequentially to a steady buzz.  

each sequential buzz would produce a different color of light until the buzz was steady at which point the light was white.  then the steady buzz would begin a sequential slowing which produced the colors of the rainbow with each slowing buzz. then the buzz sequence would start over from the slowest and darkest color with the time between pulses diminishing until a steady buzz was heard and the light was a steady white.

the light was coming in from the small bedroom window, illuminating the wall just above the dresser.  indicating the object was either hovering a few feet above the ground or maybe landed.

oddly, the light did not seem to reflect off of the wall surface as the room remained dark. the small window, about 2' square caused the light to assume this shape on the wall.  i remember the light pattern moving ever so slightly, just an inch or so. i believe it moved only laterally but maybe a n inch or so vertically as well.  i believe there was slight movement.

i went to the window but was unable to see the shape of the object clearly or at all due to the heavy fog.  however the pulsing and changing light was very distinct.  

this event scared the hell out of me. i yelled at my gal to get out of bed to see the ufo as i needed a witness, for my sake if for no other reason, but she pulled the covers over her head and began screaming while kicking her heels on the bed. this was not helpful so i yanked the covers off of her and dragged her to the window.  more screaming and back to bed with covers over her head. but she did see the lights and admitted as much several years later to friends.  after much coaxing from me i might add. 

at this time the light pattern began moving on the wall and within seconds the object had lifted fairly quickly skyward and headed off in a nw direction, low over the trees.

the next morning at work, i asked my fellow loggers if there had been a ufo sighted over the town , powell river, and there was indeed some quiet talk at the coffee shop of strange low moving lights which were seen.

years later i began to wonder if my gal and i had been abducted in our sleep as i seemed to be only aware of this object shortly before it departed.  i didn't seem to have any marks on my body other than the usual damage from logging.  however,  sore spots did appear on my temple areas, left and right some years later.  they would become sore and occasionally clear fluid would leak out.

i had these removed with dry ice three years ago. i always thought these were strange but don't know if they could be connected to that encounter.

since the encounter i awake at 3 am, give or take 10 minutes and have great difficulty falling asleep until 5 am when for some reason i suddenly feel that all is well and i can risk the vulnerability of being asleep.

i have seen 8 ufo flying in a formation of 2 abreast and trailing, in 1957 as a young man. they were round and shiny, very high and very fast as they jinked across the limitless blue sky.

a week ago at 3 am i noticed what i thought to be venus in the night sky.  after a few minutes i returned from the bathroom and noticed the light had moved substantially and was approaching slowly.  slowly as in i believe too slowly to be a large aircraft. but not really very slowly.I am a pilot.

i followed the object from the kitchen window and noticed there was no sound and the steady white lights on the under side were all wrong to be an airliner.  there was a blinking red light on the belly, which is appropriate for an airliner.  

the faintly illuminated underside showed the boomerang shape.  i really don't know what to think of this sighting but i believe it was too slow, too low, about 1000' or so, no engine noise and odd lights to be an airliner. end of story.
content.summary: Pulsing buzz with changing colors. steady buzz white light

content.detailedDescription: Greyish white sphere that hovered in air then moved down and vanished. did not fly away just vanished into the air. i've see this object twice before but couldn't tell if it was the moon but after seeing it the third time closer and clearer i know it was something else.  the other two times seeing this object were in the same spots and it was around the same time. the object was in a different spot this time.
content.summary: Greyish white sphere that hovered in air then moved down and vanished

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on second story deck. noticed two large bright lights at low altitude approaching at ten oclock position through the trees,low flying with front lights on. two forward directional lights. this i've seen before mistaking for hang-glider at night. my first thoughts were that it was a domestic airline approaching the airport to land. space between lights was way to far apart for any domestic aircraft, no sound, and slowly changed direction floating into cloud bank and disappearing towards the north. this was no domestic flight, had it been it would have continued its easterly direction to runways less than one mile from sighting location. hln montana.10:15 pm 2/10/15
content.summary: Two forward facing lights wide distance between flying out of low cloud bank and then turning to fly back into same cloud bank. size was larger than domestic airline.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading into the garage an i saw a glowing object move by then disappear stood their to see if it would come up again then saw one from the left do the same thing then leave. i watched this happen for 20-30 mins trying to take photos an failed. the object hid behind cloud cover an was dim enough that it wouldn't show up on my film but you could see it with the naked eye.I then got in my car went to the nearest fire hall still saw the object doing the same act the distance i moved in that short drive they moved in few miles like nothing. then go my car went down 15 towards harrisburg then saw two more object show up an do the same thing an kept watching for a 30 mins or so they would come together an spilt up an repeat then two formed into one object then got on 15 to try an follow more then i lost them.
content.summary: Saw a blue glow when walking outside that cuaght my eye. then saw a second one sho up from the left the disappaer then the right one i watched it from the back of the house for 20-30 mins. also trying to get photos or video an failed to do .

content.detailedDescription: My stepdad was taking his dog out for the evening and called us out to see something "strange"  we went outside and saw a bright blue light heading east, but it stopped dead, did a short 90 degree turn north, stopped dead again, changed color to red for a few moments, and continued on its path east, extremely fast speed changes, almost a jerky movement, no airplane can stop on a dime like that or start moving so quickly,  no sound whatsoever!   very different color than aircraft landing or navigation lights.  very beautiful bluish color, then red!
content.summary: Bluish then red light, abrupt course change and fast speed, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was driving southeast on the 101 freeway on my way home, and stopped with tons of other motorists on the freeway due to a large brush fire on the hillside near the las virgenes exit in calabasas, california.  i did not actually notice any orbs at the time, as i (like so many others stuck in traffic), was fascinated by the firefighting action going on in front of me.  there were 2 firefighting airplanes dumping water, along with 2 helicopters doing the same.  i took several photos while in traffic watching all of this.  i only noticed the object in my photos (taken on my cell phone), when i got home and showed my husband the pictures i took.  when i expanded the photo to view the helicopters more closely, this is when i first noticed the white/reflective orb above and in other photos to the side of the helicopter.  several weeks later, i looked on youtube to see if there were any videos posted by others who watched the fire as i did, to see if i saw anything that resembled the orb in my photos.  low and behold, there were at least 4 videos showing the same orb like thing i had in my photos, next to the helicopters, but from various angles and positions, as of course, different people were recording from different locations all around the area at the same time i was.  so although i did not notice the object at the time i captured it in my photos, there are many videos showing this thing right next to airplanes, helicopters, flying birds and you can even distinguish it from some of the dirt spots on peoples windshields.     from the video footage i've seen that the object appears as a darkish orb traveling se into the main large cloud of smoke (from the fire), then comes out of the smoke cloud a few seconds later (having made a right turn) and travels over the freeway, close to the helicopters, it now appears as a white/translucent orb traveling in a path (not going up or down but to the side only, even when in close proximity to the helicopters) having made one turn while in the smoke cloud, is last seen traveling west (going towards the coastline pch). it keeps a steady pace, only that one turn inside the cloud, but no further recordings.  it occurred to me that it might be a drone used to fight fires, however, i ask a friend of mine who is a firefighter and i showed him the photos.  he told me that they don't fly drones up that high, and that it did not look like a drone to his eye...He thought it was pretty weird.  i did not report this until now, because i didn't know where/how to report such a thing.  two of the photos are from my personal cell phone (i zoomed in so it is more clear), the others are screen shots taken from the videos on youtube.  please note that you can clearly make out the difference between a plane/helicopter and the orb. some shots show it as darker, and others lighter, also it appears bigger in some shots and smaller in comparison to the helicopter/planes it is near.
content.summary: Ufo/orb observed near calabasas during daytime fire - several photos/videos

content.detailedDescription: Myself, my wife and two other people, were standing outside the house talking. looked up and observed this huge, for lack of a better word, ship. it was so large i didn't even notice the shape. i would say almost rectangle, but the front and back were rounded. it was only about the distance of three trees above us. it moved so slow, i couldn't understand how it stayed up there. it didn't make a sound. we just stood there watching this thing slowly move across the sky, directly above us. i felt like i could almost touch it. i have a military background, and i knew right away, it was nothing we could have because it moved too slow. nobody even thought to grab a camera, we just watched it slowly move across the sky and out of sight. it took a good 10 min. for it to go from west to east and out of site. it had lots of features on it, it was not smooth, none that i could actually identify, but they were so distinct. my wife saw lights, i didn't notice lights, but it was so clear, it didn't need lights to see it. the most amazing thing i ever saw, but it was five years ago. as far as i know, nobody suffered any ill effects.
content.summary: Observed directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: It was saturday night around 10:30 and i head a weird nose down stars, i thought the lady next door had opened the garage door, she hadn’t. she was not home.  i went do and check the charge door openers they were in the cars.  i then shut the door.  i went back up stars, i looked around the room the glowing, i thought we just had a power surg., i thought nothing off it, i decided to go to sleep, i had got some band new that i may have cancer, (i have found out since then i don’t) i went to sleep and in the dream stat a had a dream about this man who had on an old combo like costume.  i looked at the man and he said “you will not die, and if you did we always come back, we do not die’, i realized his eyes had become yellow gold and his face had turned alien, the room had become full of light,  i woke up and realized the room had become almost 90 degrees.  i knew i had been visited again.  this is no longer a bad things since i am partially one of them.  he also, told me they do not like the taliban or iris they are to destructive and part of the greys.  they are watching them for us!!!!!!  “don’t be afraid anymore you knew we were here”, he sated!
content.summary: I had a visitation from them

content.detailedDescription: While moving north in vehicle in henderson. witnessed by three additional passengers. it was moving from the left to right directly in front of us many miles away. it appeared as a bright dot of light, then another, then another, then another, then a dash, all in a line. then they disappeared and it repeated again several times, all the while moving from the left from my vantage to the right. repeated three or four times until it became obstructed by local trees and buildings.
content.summary: Many miles away, moving fast, lighting up four dots and one dash, then repeated several times

content.detailedDescription: Was heading north from my job. got sent home early for not feeling well, when i noticed in the sky a weird fireball. i noticed it wasn't normal like our planes,helecopters etc. i saw it kinda by where the las vegas strip would be. it started moving in a snake-like way , leaving a trail of lights behind it. i noticed it was not a plane. it proceeded to move in and out three times in the 10 mins i was walking an watching it . literally gave me chills for that duration of time. it made me feel amazed and happy? i didn't feel like it was threatening at all just very strange to see. i lost sight of it when i was walking down the green valley hill.
content.summary: Seen a golden serpent like orb going across the sky , would disappear then come back .Did it three time

content.detailedDescription:
Just for kicks i took this video from the airliner i was on beginning it's final descent into pvd. when i watched the video later on i noticed the object fly by at approximately the four second mark. this was in the area of montauk pt. ny and block island, ri. the details on the video says east hampton ny. i did not notice the object at the time i took the video with my phone.

i'm just curious to know what the heck it is.
content.summary: Saw object on video after event

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dogs up a private road on our property. turned and saw a beautiful sundog, perfectly shaped rainbow arc radius around the sun.Winter's day sun, very pretty; too bright to look at so held up my cell phone and pushed the button for the shot. did not see the orb until afterward when reviewing the photo. orb had a semi circular arc ascending away from the sun and against the stream of clouds/rays in the photo. upon closer review and zoom, i then noticed the 4 lights in a perfectly formed diamond pattern with a slight ray of light connecting them, like a dot to dot. the orb itself did not seem like a planet, it was gaseous and vapor like, without clearly defined lines as you see when viewing a planet or the moon. best closeup on zoom i can get shows one of the lights is a v-shaped pattern, facing in the direction of the trajectory arc surrounding the orb, again going sw away from the other patterns in the photo. wish i'd seen the orb while still outside, would have caught a video, but sun was so bright, did not dare to look directly into the visual area with naked eye. feel very strongly this is not the iss, as it was not at this point on our lat/longitude according to tracking it would not have been visible until 7:40 pm est and in the wnw sky; this was s/sw exactly 5 hours prior to iss viewing availability. (within exactly 5 hours...Interesting- and why would the iss be surrounded or within a pink orb?) eerily similar to another sighting posted on mufon from florida; same location near sun, same pink arc, 2 days prior to my sighting.
content.summary: Pink gaseous orb w 4 bright lights in diamond shaped pattern

content.detailedDescription:
i am a security guard for a private company. a second security guard and i were  walking to a vehicle when i looked up and spotted the object rising into the sky on the wast horizon. i pointed it out to the other guard.
   the object was a very bright light but far away so we could not see details.This was at full dark on a clear night with only one small cloud in sight.
    we watched the object rise up and go into a the cloud. it appeared to stop inside the cloud for over a minute the headed out at a south eastern direction at a fast speed. it was heading right at us , very high in the sky.
    we then heard a plane getting very loud . it was coming from behind us going west.
     a few seconds latter we saw the plane and realized the object and the plane were on a collision course and we both became afraid they were going to collide.
     the plane then dived down ward at a fast rate and the bright object passed directly over it. the plane continued to dive until it leveled out at such a low altitude that we could clearly see the flames from the jet engines.
   in the dark we could see it had 4 engines and the shape of a large passenger jet. the plane the cont. west
    i cont. to watch the object going south east , never changing speed or direction until it just suddenly disappeared.  it was there in the sky and then just gone.
  when i turned back to the plane it was almost to the   horizon.
  at the time of this occurrence there were 2 other plane light clearly in the sky not evolved  in this incident and since this area is a high traffic passenger plane route there are almost always one up to 7 planes flying in this area at any time. for the next 2 hours all plane traffic was gone from the sky, it was as if all traffic had been rerouted .
  there has to be some very panicky communications that went on from the pilots of the plane that was almost hit and the traffic control tower controlling plane traffic in this area.
   i was glad 2 of us witness this.
   hope some one comes forward and collaborates  what happened
content.summary: {nd} i & another witness observed a bright object rise, stop then head in direction noted at a steady pace almost striking a passenger jet, the airplane dove downward barly missing collision with ufo. the object continued on pass the airplane vanished

content.detailedDescription: To much to talk about i recall being abducted from the time i was a child. in 1988 i was on my way to a friends house where her,her husband an anther fried were waiting for me bcuz we had a night out planned. i was running about 10 mins late so sherry kept calling an my dad told her i was on my way a few times. i finally after being 15 minutes late i left home as she was calling again an my dad said that i just walked out bcuz i was. i hit the road an as i am going up each rabbit road i looked at the sky an had jus said this is going to be a great nite. there wasn't a cloud in the sky it was about 70 degrees an the atmosphere was calm. as i'm thinking an saying this i'm looking out an all of a sudden i'm under a shadow of a cloud i that but that wasn't the case. i remember looking up an the next thing you know i'm looking at a gray alien that communicated with his mind. we we're looking down at betties crossroads where i seen my mom auntie an uncle all waving up at us amongst about 10 other vehicles that were observing it. he asked me if i wanted to see more an i said yes bcuz i didn't feel threatened. the next thing i no we were gone an it's showing me a little girl in a huge room full of kids an it looked like human woman but i don't know an then it's introducing me to a little girl of about 6 or 7 yrs old an said she was mine. they gave me the option to stay an i declined. i believe i was given a message also but don't know. when i came to i was standing next to my car an was looking at the sky. when i reached my destination sherry asked where he'll i was bcuz 2 hrs had passed an they drove up an down that road looking for me, they called my dad over an over again an he told them that i honestly left an was going straight there. the next day my dad asked me where i had went an i told him of my experience an memories of it an he said sounds like you were abducted an i told him i was. i told him what i saw and about me meeting a child i have in the skies. he went to his grave knowing that i was telling the truth an that sherry had looked for me for like 2 hrs before i showed up. i swear on a bible i went straight there an i met my part human/alien child an she was beautiful with pale colored skin an eyes smaller then the aliens an yet bigger then a humans an yet she was beautiful an bashful or quite i don't think she knew how to think when they introduced us. call me crazy but i'm a firm believer an know i have been taken since childhood. the aliens i was taken by are here for good things not bad altho i'm sure there maybe cruel ones out there also.
content.summary: Showed me space and a little girl i have that is being cared for by them. i was also given the opportunity to stay among them. they do have human beings among them i seen human women taking care of our children.

content.detailedDescription: It was sunday around noon, i was messing with my new phone, snapping pictures of random things. i snapped off a bunch of shots at the sun for maybe 3 seconds. i'm not going to look at the sun for a long time, so i know it was only a second or two. i never saw the object while taking the pictures, only after i went inside. it seems whatever it is, traveled thousands of miles in less than five seconds.
content.summary: Snapped off pictures of the sun for about 3 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Was leaving home my at about 1:00am to workout at my 24/7 gym and saw an object ssw through trees with no leaves. it appeared to be triangular in shape with a longer row of green lights below, and shorter row of red lights in from.  i live about 2 miles from bay saint louis (gulf of mexico) and it could have been over these bodies of water. the lights were bright, possibly a little brighter than typical airplane lights. curious that it was slowly rising, i watched as it rose above the tree level to about 45 degrees.  this took about 2-3 minutes.  it was rising so slowly i initially thought it was stationary.  at that point it turned to a horizontal position with the red lights now in front and green on rear.  it took off at a rapidly increasing speed and appeared to be at a very high altitude.  it took about a minute or so for it to disappear from view--an area of approximately 90 degrees.  my home is between stennis aerospace and keesler airforce base in biloxi/gulfport.  so i see planes often, but nothing like this.  just curious.
content.summary: Object rose slowly then move rapidly toward the nw

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on hwy 10 east of cochella valley, ca (about 40-50 miles away) with a friend. the sky was pitch black at 10:15 pm. we looked to the southwest when we saw this blue circle light in the distance.

 we both asked ourselves if we saw the object. we stared at it for about 2-3 minutes then it disappeared. about 10 mins.Later, it reappeared, but was closer to us; then it looked like it was moving closer to us. it then started to glow completely white around the blue object. it was also being followed by two other smaller blue circle objects. the other two, however, were not glowing. they were traveling east. the larger object stopped glowing after about 60 seconds.
content.summary: A light blue circle in the sky that glowed, along with two other light blue circles not glowing

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were fishing on clarkshill lake aka lake thurmond.  i noticed a contrail in the sky.  i looked away for a moment then looked back up at the contrail and that's when i noticed the object just to the right of the contrail.  i could see the whole right side of object but it was translucent.  the left side was completely transparent.  i could make out the outline of the right side with a pattern on the inside. it must have been tilted because i could make out the whole right side of the circular object.  i said to my husband, look there is an object, but i knew he would not be able to see it unless his eyes were already fixed on the object.  after pointing to the object and telling him it's to the right of contrail it went completely transparent. the object appeared to be very slowly moving to the left of contrail when it went completely transparent.  i was completely in awe that i finally had witnessed what i know was a ufo.  i have always been a believer and hoped that one day i would witness such an event.  i'm disappointed that my husband didn't see such a fascinating event as i did.  i'm very disappointed that i do not have a photo or video of what i witnessed.  we continue to fish on that lake and i will be ready with camera in case i am fortunate enough to witness such an extraordinary event again. i wanted to report my experience to mufon when the event took place but without physical proof i decided not to. i changed my mind recently when our local paper had an article about reported ufo sightings in our area over the years.  the reports made were not similar to mine.  they were sightings of lights seen in the sky.  the fact that i saw what was apparently an object cloaking itself doesn't leave me questioning what i witnessed.  i know what i saw that day and i will never forget it.
content.summary: Looked like it was in process of cloaking

content.detailedDescription:
1)i was in my home watching tv before going to bed. it was around 1am.
2)when my brother called me over to see it. we looked into the backyard, from inside the house. my brother said he noticed it was there for five minutes.
3)i thought it was a star, or a planet, just really bright.
4)it looked like a bright yellow-orange star, brighter than the others at night. there weren't a whole lot of other stars out at this time. when i observed it for about a minute it started to move. when it moved it moved in a circular motion, then back to back. it didn't move the way a helicopter or jet could move. after moving away, it circled to where it was, then just took off.
5)i was curious as to what it was. when it started to move, my brother and i thought it was an aircraft for a moment, then it started to move in ways aircraft don't move, i was excited and startled. my brother and i rationalized what it could have been. my brother thinks it might have been an alien space craft. i am not sure what it could have been. it might have been an alien space craft, but i also think it might have been a small drone. where it was positioned, it looked like it was over by the creek where the mansions are (where supposed drug dealers live when they are in miami). perhaps it was a government drone spying on drug dealers?
6)it flew away over some houses behind my backyard and then off too my right. that's when we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Saw a light that i thought was a star, then it moved in a weird way planes or copters don't move

content.detailedDescription: The power was out over entire town due to storm. pge had a few super bright lights, oddly some making sweeping motions skyward. went outside to get some air, and saw 2 bright orange lights on the horizon. they moved upward in unison. suddenly a third star-like object appeared next to them, but it was quite a bit larger than the original two. the hovered for a moment, then seemed to take off toward space, giving the visual impression of moving away from the earth...Like a reverse shooting star. i had a pretty decent telescope at the time, so i brought it out. two more objects appeared about 3 mins. later. watched them through the scope...Appeared as super bright orange lights. they vanished the same way as the first 3, but this time an airplane approached lights, didn't stop and passed under before they took off. i was with a friend and my husband.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright orange red starlike lights on ca coast

content.detailedDescription: Blinking lights obserevd. these were way to high to be helicopters. several were obserevd. they had motion to them. it did not appear to be wind currents. the lights were extremely bright do to the ability to see them miles away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Blinking lights in sky, way to high to be a helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
While standing in front of are house having a cigarette,me and another witness noticed some weird lights in the distance.,what caught are attention was the fact that it looked like a radio station tower beacon light's,except that there is no radio station tower over in that direction.,as we were trying to figure out what we were seeing i ran and got my video camera.,when i got back to where i could see the light's again the flashing red and white light's started moving around in different directions.,it looked like there were two set's of light's.,then the light's went from a vertical position to a horizontal position.,then they went to an slanted position.,we then realized that we weren't looking at a radio station tower any more.,the light's then seem to merge into one another,then back away from each other.,this went on for about 5-min or so.,
then we saw a white flash of light and the light's were gone.,i have seen airplane's flying in that area on numerous occasion's,(flight path)and this was not an airplane!.,i took video of the event,but on a old mini-8 camcorder,so the video is of poor quality due to being dark out.,but you can clearly see that there were two separate light's/object's.,,we got in a car and drove towards were we had seen the light's,but we seen no sign of the light's that we observed earlier.,it was a site to see!.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: While out having a cigarett,me and another person witnessed two objects dancing around in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: As my son and i were traveling down the road by aliante casino heading towards centennial hills, we noticed a very large fire ball trail that was hanging over the mountains. i first thought meteor, but it was hovering over the mountains. as i slowed down, it dissappeared for about 15 seconds, then reappeared. very large almost as large as the mountain. it was like the fire ball was rotating. then it disappeared.
content.summary: Above the northern mountains saw a large circular fire ball and lights.

content.detailedDescription: A white figure was in the sky almost like a large drone. it had red and blue flashing lights.  it was almost like a police cars lights.  i felt very nervous when i saw it.  it is happening as i am writing this. i was in my room when i looked out my window and saw it bumping around.  i thought it was a plane flying over my house, which is very common because mdt and lns have ils approaches, a common airplane landing prodecure, directly above my house. it never moved or got closer which is why i noticed it.
content.summary: A white figure with white and red blinking lights, police-like. moves slightly.

content.detailedDescription:
Just before noon on february 9, 2015, i was on my patio photographing jet aircraft.  i was photographing a boeing 737 when i noticed another object in the camera view finder.  i snapped a couple of quick photos, then centered the object in the view finder.  when i tried to snap the next photo, the auto focus couldn't focus on the object.  after a couple of unsuccessful attempts, i switched the lens to manual focus, panned down to a nearby treetop, focused on that, and then turned the focus ring a little more for the extra distance needed.  i looked back up into the sky, and could still see the object.  it was bright white, approximately spherical, and seemed to float in the air currents.  it was quite high (3 miles up, maybe more).  i suspected that it was some type of helium balloon.  after watching it for maybe 6 to 7 seconds, i then tried to get it in the view finder again, but was unsuccessful.  i could still see it, so i switched the lens back to auto-focus, and again focused on the nearby treetop.  when i looked back up into the sky, i could not spot the object again.  the whole siting lasted about 20 to 25 seconds.  i was rather frustrated that i couldn't get a better focused photo.  the object did not move in a straight line, but rather drifted a little left to right, while moving away and higher at the same time.  it was a lot slower than the plane.  the plane moved past the object by the time i snappped the second photo, while the object moved up.
     i use the flight radar 24 phone app for my plane spotting.  the aircraft was american airlines flight aa1698, san juan to dallas, boeing 737-823, call sign n858nn, altitude 37,000 feet (data from the phone app).  it was roughly 5 miles (ground distance) from my location (per the map in the phone app), and approximately due north when i photographed it.  it was about 50 degrees off the horizon.  a weak cold front passed through baton rouge the night before, and it was a "no-contrail day", meaning that most jet aircraft do not leave contrails.  they are more difficult to spot and get in the view finder on these days.  
     my camera is a canon t3i rebel digital slr.  the lens was a canon telephoto zoom 75-300 mm, set to 300 mm.  it is an inexpensive "kit lens".  at 300 mm the field of view is 6 degrees and 50 minutes, according to the instruction sheet for the lens. the camera was mounted on a cheap tripod.  
   i am attaching the two photos, each with a cropped version.  i am fairly certain this was some type of balloon, but probably not a child's balloon or party balloon.  there seems to be some type of tether at the bottom of the object, and a black spot on the left side in the second photo.
content.summary: White spherical or egg-shaped object that seemed to float on the air currents
